if you want a game that takes time and you dont want to be glued to the screen yet offers we you want to imagine on character progression this is a really great game   cant say i have not enjoyed those hours yet have been challenged and puzzled and learned to love how much information and intuitiveness we take for granted   this game is a great reminder for childhood games and exploration without getting everything handfed to understand it

an interesting adventure game but in slow motion  travel  takes a minute  harvesting  takes 5  crafting spears  takes over an hour each  if you would like to speed up things buy blue crowns  want a healing potion  if you have the skills you can craft it or use blue crowns  want to do anything at a decent speed  buy more blue crowns  its a pay to play game

if you specifically enjoyed the skill queue designation mechanic in eve you will enjoy this game it is entirely built around optimizing that kind of decision

this is a gem for those who like this kind of game i havent seen any other great games like this with similar mechanics the crafting is superb this is definitely not a mainstream game and it has a very small community i loved it although i stopped playing right around when i got to norstria because it takes so long to complete quests at that point i did really enjoy making spreadsheets and having to refer to the wiki for gameplay
this is an idle rpg runs terribly for just that id suggest their other game if you still want a similar genre of semi idle rpg

at first glance this game feels like a common mobile idler this couldnt be further from the truth the depth and complexity of this gem is incredible the learning curve is somewhat steep at first but the community is friendlier and more helpful than most it is free to play but to truly unlock its potential you will need about 5 to unlock a few necessities for long term play try it out if you like it its worth the money

this game is amazing and addictive  no game has captivated me like this since everquest nearly 20 years ago  there is always something new something to progress towards and always engaging  its not a hack and slash its not a pay to win its not a instant gratification game  you are in it for the long haul  if you enjoyed pen and papermud games or enjoyed playing games that take time and effort i urge you to give this an honest try and you will not be disappointed

no time limit or attached time constraints  a typical click and wait game albeit with a complex and deep system that will keep you going at it for years on end it all starts off rather slow and requires a bit of patience before getting accustomed to everything  the game doesnt have a particularly large number of players though making its internal game market a little anaemic if a few more players were to join it would make the game a lot more lively

a great way to spend a few minutes or a few hours  plan your heros actions and set them on their way  what you do and how you achieve what you want are entirely up to you  follow a quest line explore the countryside hunt and fish your way through the forests or become that mercantile dynamo dealing in hard to get materials  i find this to be an engaging diversion with strategic planning elements limited only by my action points and what i want to accomplish within a certain timeframe
check it out

definitely a good game to spend time in the community is really friendly the game itself is enjoyable and with a nice blend between active and idle you can still play the game even if you dont have plenty of time it is not pay to win at all and the premium currency can even be traded for with ingame gold trading with other players all the benefits are more quality of life than op definitely recommend it

a great way to spend a few minutes or a few hours  plan your heros actions and set them on their way  what you do and how you achieve what you want are entirely up to you  follow a quest line explore the countryside hunt and fish your way through the forests or become that mercantile dynamo dealing in hard to get materials  i find this to be an engaging diversion with strategic planning elements limited only by my action points and what i want to accomplish within a certain timeframe
check it out

a very deep craftingoriented rpg not p2w at all and with a very helpful friendly community  takes patience as gameplay centres around completing realtime tasksbutthese are completed even when you are offline  definitely engaging

a lot to do but this is a true idle game to the point where you queue up a few things to do check the game in 10 hours starting out as a new player is somewhat painful as you can not afford to buy the time reduction items hoping with time it will be more fun if i could give a sideways thumb i would xd
not to bad
great game small but friendly community
what i have played i have injoyed  as always its free so if you can dl it with out a care for data and space try it

been playing for a while and i am very pleased to see the game arrive on steam it reminds me of the goold old browser games like planetarion dawn of myth etc only not that war intense but with the things taking hours to accomplish which i realize is not for everyone but it is still a damn fine secondary trading game

the best game of it genre  i must say im likeing therian saga very much its very unique and theres no need to spend any real life money within the game at all made a couple of trade agreements with other players to help each other out it was hard to understand how the skills work and where to progress in that skill at first maybe a updated tutorial is needed thats just my opinion  its great the people are lovely and the game looks and feels good to play

this is very much the best secondary relaxing check once in a while game i have ever played and no i am not joking its suprisingly indepth and has a loooot of things going for it mainly crafting but it has also building trading and dungeon crawling an unique and well done game just down my alley coming from someone who very much enjoyed browser games of the late 90s early 2000
yeah not that many hours but its nice to play takes a long time to play but is nice to check on every here and there was very happy to see it on steam now i can play it finally
if you are looking for a lonewolf mmorpg type of game this is the closest you can get
